name: Combined Arms Operations
description: Coordinating multiple branches of military forces for joint operations.

cards.title: Coordinating Air and Ground Forces
cards.description: Using air superiority to support ground combat operations.
cards.bulletpoints: Close air support, joint strike coordination, aerial reconnaissance

cards.title: Naval and Amphibious Operations
cards.description: Integrating naval forces in land-based combat.
cards.bulletpoints: Amphibious landings, fleet support, carrier strike group tactics
